channel.title: How do I make the clock at the top of my server update automaticly?
channel.description:
Hi,
I have a clock on the top of my server, but it says the right time, but, it doesn't update unless you log out and in, how do I make it so that it works like a normal clock ( if you no what I mean ), like when it tells you how many players are online, that updates automaticly without you having to log out and in.
Do I need to add something in boolean process? Like writeplayers(),
Thanks.
Musicmad441

item.title: How do I make the clock at the top of my server update automaticly?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Put in in public boolean process

Read full topic

item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

try something like UpdateAppearance = true;
